title: 环境MOD config文件 修改求助
author: Μπλε
txt_content:
我们做了个MOD包含一个方块，设置方块在环境MOD里的属性，可修改文件后没效果。求各位大神帮忙看看改的对不对。

 我们修改的是block properties  下的，加了如下代码，但不管用
S:"Custom Objects"=3000, -1, 3000, -1, 0, 50, 5, 5, 5, 5, c

# Configuration file

####################
# armor properties
#===================
# Add properties for custom armors here. Add the armor name to 'Custom Objects' before creating the property here. 
# Property Format: <ItemID>, <AddTempAtNight>, <AddTempInShade>, <AddTempInSun>, <AirTempMultiplyer>, <F/C 

(Farenheit or Celcius)>
####################

"armor properties" {
    S:"Diamond Boots"=313, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.5, C
    S:"Diamond Chest"=311, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.5, C
    S:"Diamond Helmet"=310, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.5, C
    S:"Diamond Legs"=312, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.5, C
    S:"Gold Boots"=309, 0.0, 0.0, 3.0, 1.1, C
    S:"Gold Chest"=307, 0.0, 0.0, 3.0, 1.1, C
    S:"Gold Helmet"=306, 0.0, 0.0, 3.0, 1.1, C
    S:"Gold Legs"=308, 0.0, 0.0, 3.0, 1.1, C
    S:"Iron Boots"=309, -1.0, 0.0, 5.0, 1.1, C
    S:"Iron Chest"=307, -1.0, 0.0, 5.0, 1.1, C
    S:"Iron Helmet"=306, -1.0, 0.0, 5.0, 1.1, C
    S:"Iron Legs"=308, -1.0, 0.0, 5.0, 1.1, C
    S:"Leather Boots"=301, 2.0, 2.0, 2.0, 1.0, C
    S:"Leather Chest"=299, 2.0, 2.0, 2.0, 1.0, C
    S:"Leather Helmet"=298, 2.0, 2.0, 2.0, 1.0, C
    S:"Leather Legs"=300, 2.0, 2.0, 2.0, 1.0, C
}


####################
# block properties
#===================
# Add properties for custom blocks here. Add the block name to 'Custom Objects' before creating the property here. 
# Property Format: <BlockID>, <BlockMeta(-1 to ignore)>, <DropID>, <DropMeta(-1 to ignore)>, <DropNum>, 

<BlockTemp>, <SanityPerSecond>, <AirQualityPerSecond>, <CanFallThreshold(0-26)>, <MustFallThreshold(0-26)>, <F/C 

(Farenheit or Celcius)>
####################

"block properties" {
    S:"Custom Objects"=3000, -1, 3000, -1, 0, 50, 5, 5, 5, 5, c
}


####################
# custom objects
#===================
# Lists of objects that have envionmental properties
####################

"custom objects" {
    S:"Armor List"=
    S:"Block List"=
    S:"Living List"=
}


####################
# entityliving properties
#===================
# Add properties for custom living entities here. Add the entity name to 'Custom Objects' before creating the property here. 
# Property Format: <EntityName(E.G. EntityPigZombie)>, <Dehydrate(T/F)>, <BodyTemp?(T/F)>, <AirQuality?(T/F)>
####################

"entityliving properties" {
}


####################
# general
####################

general {
    B:"Enable Air Quality"=true
    B:"Enable Body Temperature"=true
    B:"Enable Hydration"=true
    B:"Enable Physics"=true
    B:"Enable Saddle Recipe"=true
    B:"Enable Sanity"=true
    B:"Use Farenheit instead of Celsius"=false
}


####################
# item
####################

item {
    I:"Cold Water Bottle"=5003
    I:"Dirty Water Bottle"=5001
    I:"Salt Water Bottle"=5002
}


####################
# potions
####################

potions {
    I:Dehydration=51
    I:Frostbite=50
    I:Insanity=52
}
